definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: blighted or blasted thing;—[[לִפְנֵי קָמָה]] ´[[וּשׁ]]: 2Ki 19:26 a blasted thing before (the standing grain, i.e. before maturity ( > [[שְׁדֵמָה]] field, as ‖ Is 37:27, cf. Di), but improb.; Th prop. [[וָדִים]] ´[[ל]] :´[[וּשׁ]]:; Kit [[שְׁדֻף הַקָּדִים]]; We (and most since) ´[[וּשְׁדֵפָֽה  ׇלְפָנַי קֻמְךָ וגו]]: (Che: [[וּשְׁפָיִים]], for [[וּשְׁדֵפָה]]).
